title: Community-based syndromic surveillance for influenza-like illness
abstract: This study evaluates the effectiveness of community-based surveillance systems during hospital surges...

title: Climate-resilient health infrastructure in coastal regions
abstract: An assessment of structural vulnerabilities in healthcare facilities facing rising sea levels and extreme storm surges.
whyCanaryCares: Directly informs facility-level vulnerability assessments for hurricane preparedness.
